scripts.reset:dev: npx sequelize-cli db:drop --env development && npx sequelize-cli db:create --env development && npm run migrate:dev
scripts.reset:test: npx sequelize-cli db:drop --env test && npx sequelize-cli db:create --env test && npm run migrate:test
scripts.seed:dev: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
